author: Daily News staff
title: Yreka Chargers hosting playoff games today: Yreka Midgets squad plays at 4 p.m.
text: Yreka Chargers hosting playoff games today: Yreka Midgets squad plays at 4 p.m. Comment   By Daily News staff Posted Oct. 24, 2015 at 12:09 PM By Daily News staff Posted Oct. 24, 2015 at 12:09 PM YREKA The Yreka Chargers youth football league is hosting three playoff football games on Saturday at Miner Stadium in Yreka.One squad from Yreka, the Chargers Midgets team, is playing at 4 p.m. against Oroville. The Chargers Midgets team finished second in league with a 4-1 mark. In the PeeWee division, Durham will face Orland at noon. In the Jr Midget division, Gridley is set to face West Valley at 2 p.m. Members of this year's Chargers Midgets team are: Skylar Conrad, Tanner Ewing, Anthoni Evangelisti, Parker Finley, Nathan Hoven, Chris Kienlen, Skyler Lane, Mason Lang, Jacob Martin, Jackson McCauliffe, Silas McFall, Jake Peterson, Brandon Prince, Coleson Rice, Tyler Rightmier, Trey Setzer, Devin Shackelford, John Stuart, Calvin Thackery. Head coach is Jess Harris. By Daily News staff   By Daily News staff
